flawed_nl_solution:
The original length of the bathroom is 96 sq ft/8 ft = <<96/8=21>>21 ft
The new length of the bathroom is 21ft + 2 ft = <<21+2=23>>23 ft
The new width of the bathroom is 8 ft + 2 ft = <<8+2=10>>10 ft
The new area of the bathroom is 23ft x 10 ft = <<23*10=230>>230 sq ft
#### 230

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
